page.title: 12LIFE OF A COMMUTER
page.content: Many people who live in Blofield, Blofield Heath and the surrounding villages commute daily to work in Norwich. We live in Blofield and my father works at the Norfolk and Norwich Hospital and twice a week he works at the West Norwich Hospital. He gets up at 7.15 approx. has breakfast at about 7.30, where he reads the paper to catch up with the days events. Then at 8.00 he leaves for work. He takes an average of twenty minutes to drive the 8 miles to the hospital. But sometimes it is longer because the roads are busier. He returns home at about 7.00, after a long days work, but sometimes he is later because he has to go to meetings and hold lectures.
